evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: AFGE, AFSCME, NNOC/NNU, SEIU, NAGE, and NFFE (“Plaintiff Unions”) bring this action on behalf of themselves as organizations and on behalf of their members, who have lost statutory and contractual protections at work due to the Exclusion Order.
